name: SoundoftheColoroftheYear
0:
”Alexa, open Sound of the Color of the Year”
”Alexa, launch Sound of the Color of the Year”
”Alexa, play Sound of the Color of the Year”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sound of the color of the year
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Audio UX partnered with Pantone to create the first-ever Sound of the Color of the Year. The sound of PANTONE 19-4052 Classic Blue is built on the timelessness and enduring nature of PANTONE 19-4052 Classic Blue, as our hearts call for a nostalgic song that takes us to a place of comfort and familiarity. The Sound of the Color of the Year utilizes traditional instruments treated in innovative ways, bridging the gap between past and present.

This skill contains the exclusive release of the ambient music that premiered at the reveal event at ARTECHOUSE NYC. 

To jump right into an audio experience, say, "Alexa, ask Sound of the Color of the Year to play the Event Music" for a looping ambiance.

If you have any questions about the experience, please email info@auxnyc.com or visit www.auxnyc.com/pantone2020 for more details on the project.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
